column5: This year was my second year targeting lake trout ever. I think we did alright, but I really want to up my game and improve. I've heard many people say Ontario is a great place for Lake Trout fishing. So, my question is; what types of jigging lures do you guys use there? I have a YouTube Channel called "Fougere Family Adventures" and a Facebook group called "Lake Trout Fishing BC." My focus is to learn as much as I can and to also help others learn as well. Here's a link to a compilation video of some of the lake trout we caught this year. https://youtu.be/brMXA6_Gty8
